name: Kyong Hwan Jin
content: Image Processing Algorithm Lab. @ EE, Korea University IPA Home Research Publication Project Teaching Opening History Award Members Professor Members Alumni Sites EE @ KU Github openreview CMT Internal IPA Wiki IPA on-going Image Processing Algorithm Lab. @ EE, Korea University 고려대학교 영상처리알고리즘 연구실에 오신것을 환영합니다. We are a research group developing neural networks for image processing. IPA was founded 01SEP2023 at School of Electrical Engineering, Korea University. Keywords : deep learning, AI, neural networks, signal/image processing, inverse problem Notices 석사과정 | 박사과정 대학원생 모집> Opening News [2025 SEP 6] One paper has been accepted to WACV 2026! > Link Decoder based on 2D Gaussian Splatting [2025 JUN 26] 4 papers have been accepted to ICCV 2025! > Link SR w/ image-based RAG JPEG Neural Operator Dual Recursive Feedback for SDS editing LUT SR w/ interpolation kernel [2025 FEB 27] 3 papers have been accepted to CVPR 2025! > Link Lossless INR representation (LINR), [Project] Image Editing T2I diffusion with identity-focused fixed-point iterator (IDS), [Project] VideoSR with Fourier & B-spline basis [Project] [2025 FEB 17] Prof. Jin will serve as an Area Chair for NeurIPS 2025 .
